### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing pipes
- Ensure the target position is not occupied by water or another entity before attempting to place a pipe.
- Remove any existing entity at the target position before attempting to place a pipe.
- Make sure to move to the target position or ensure the target position is within the allowed distance before attempting to place a pipe.

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure the offshore pump and boiler are correctly positioned and connected before attempting to use them.
- Check the positions of the offshore pump and boiler to ensure they are correctly connected.

### Errors when using entities
- Ensure the entity is fueled and connected to the correct fluid system before attempting to use it.
- Check the entity's status and warnings to ensure it is working correctly.

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure the target position is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place an entity.
- Make sure to move to the target position or ensure the target position is within the allowed distance before attempting to place an entity.

### Errors when using the API
- Ensure the correct API functions are used for the intended action.
- Check the API documentation to ensure the correct parameters are being passed to the functions.
